AboutUs.AboutUs_1: Salamtech application is designed to raise the level of health care services and establish a link between health care seekers and providers in a manner that ensures high efficiency while saving time, effort and cost.
AboutUs.AboutUs_3: Enhanced system and applications leading to higher efficiency, productivity and profitability.
AboutUs.AboutUs_4: Follow your progress any time anywhere.
AboutUs.AboutUs_5: Improved patient’s satisfaction and focus on quality.
AboutUs.AboutUs_6: Keep patients’ historical information and records.
AboutUs.AboutUs_7: Organized appointment and better time management.
